name: Haystack Village (Alpha Release)
description:
This build is still in alpha - Please be aware that some game features have not yet been implemented and bugs may be encountered. Some of the character portraits are still in progress. I apologize in advance for any issues encountered.

Overview

Seeking a peaceful life, you move to Haystack Village, a small farming town secluded from the rest of society. But upon arrival, you discover that there are dark secrets hidden underneath it’s serene surface.

Unravel the town’s mysteries while starting a farm, befriending the locals, and ensuring the survival of not only yourself but the people around you!

Notes

Thank you for playing my game! I've been learning Unity and working to become a game developer for a couple years now and this is my first real foray into the field. There is still a lot to add so I enjoy hearing feedback and comments. If you're interested in working on Haystack Village, message me about joining the project!

Credits

Game created by Jake Gosche

Character portraits by Iweta Grodecka
